channel.title: Projects on Hui-Jun Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Hui-Jun Chen

item.title: Projects
item.description: The following computer programs are those I have written. Most (or all) of them are Linux-based programs, so they might not work on Windows, or even on MacOS. They are sorted in order on the frequency I use them and/or my priority to promote them. Dmenufm: a simple file manager using dmenu and written in POSIX-compliant shell script. able to manage files with bulk selection mode corresponding vim plugin Dmenubib: a simple bibliography manager using dmenu and written in POSIX-compliant shell script.
